page.title: 08Godalming Fire Station
page.content: At Godalming Fire Station there are 20 men, 8 of them full-time. No-one is on duty as all the calls go to Reigate then are sent to the stations. Each fire station has a number, Godalming's is 24. Each vehicle has a number, Godalming's are 242 and 243. The engines are made by Dennis and Ford. They have approximately 10 call-outs each week, 500-1000 in a year. Our firemen have never been to rescue a cat from a tree but have fought some fierce fires. There is much equipment on each appliance such as pumps, generators, breathing apparatus, winches, lights, ladders etc.. The furthest they have travelled to a fire was to the Royal Holloway Sanatorium.
